message.content: {"responses": [{"question_id": "TT4G35A", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers write or improve lesson plans.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35B", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35C", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence assists teachers in supporting students individually.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35D", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs).", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35E", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence helps teachers automate administrative tasks.", "response": "Strongly agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35F", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35G", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35H", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35I", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence jeopardises the privacy and security of student data.", "response": "Agree"}, {"question_id": "TT4G35J", "input_statement": "Artificial intelligence suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students.", "response": "Agree"}]}
message.reasoning_content:
I need to respond to each of the 10 statements about AI in education as a primary or secondary school teacher from Bulgaria. Let me think through each statement carefully:

[TT4G35A]: AI helps teachers write or improve lesson plans - This is generally true. AI tools can assist in brainstorming and drafting lesson plans. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35B]: AI enables teachers to adapt learning material to different students' abilities - This is a capability AI can offer through personalization. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35C]: AI assists teachers in supporting students individually - AI can help with personalized learning paths and feedback. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35D]: AI supports students with specific needs (e.g. multilingual learners, students with special education needs) - AI can provide translation, accessibility features, and specialized support. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35E]: AI helps teachers automate administrative tasks - This is definitely true. AI can help with grading, attendance, scheduling, etc. I would say "Strongly agree"

[TT4G35F]: AI enables students to misrepresent others' work as their own - This is a legitimate concern with AI tools that can generate content. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35G]: AI makes recommendations that may not be appropriate or correct - This is a real limitation of AI systems. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35H]: AI amplifies biases that reinforce students' misconceptions - This is a documented concern with AI systems. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35I]: AI jeopardises the privacy and security of student data - This is a valid concern when using AI systems with student data. I would say "Agree"

[TT4G35J]: AI suggests unsuitable pedagogical approaches that teachers would use with students - This could happen if AI is not properly trained or aligned with educational best practices. 

I would say "Agree" for this one as well. Now I need to structure these responses for submission.
